meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to 10 meters.
meanings.sent1: The decameter is used to measure longer distances.
meanings.sent2: The decameter is commonly used in construction projects.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought a decameter of fabric instead of a meter!
meanings.sent4: Her patience stretched to a decameter as she waited for the bus.
meanings.sent5: The decameter stretched out before them, marking the start of the race.

meanings.definition: A line or plane 10 meters in length.
meanings.sent1: The decameter of rope was just enough to reach the ground.
meanings.sent2: The decameter of fencing material was used to secure the area.
meanings.sent3: He pretended the decameter of tape was a magic rope.
meanings.sent4: The decameter of sunlight illuminated the room with a golden glow.
meanings.sent5: The decameter of road stretched straight ahead into the distance.
